title: Search is fixed
content: Finally got search fixed. Accidentally introduced a glitch while we were doing the upgrade, and hadn't had the time to address until now.
author: Jared Benson

comments.content: Will we have to wait a while for it to return full results? Right now it seems to be missing a lot.
Yeah, it's still reindexing the site, so bear with us. I'm also looking into other search enhancements we can add to these basic results.
